item.title: Second Post First Data Engineering Project, Focus: Airflow
item.author: Jonathan de Jesus Azor
item.description: Post is under construction, this is available for testing purposes only. ETL Diagram of my first project *Extraction:* API containing the crime data from Austin, Texas. *Transform:* Was performed in Visual Studio utilizing Pandas. *Load:* Data was uploaded into the data warehouse Big Query (Google Cloud Datastore). *Airflow:* Chosen due to popularity Aiflow documentation: [Link](https://airflow.apache.org/docs/apache-airflow/stable/tutorial.html) Populating arguments Declaring Dags Setting up Task & dependencies *Visualization:* Data Studio because of easy to share and fully customizable dashboards/reports.

item.title: First Post: Do you want to set an awesome website like this ?
